org.alljoyn.ns

Interface NotificationReceiver


  • public interface NotificationReceiver
    An interface to be implemented in order to receive notification messages

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dismiss(int msgId, java.util.UUID appId)
      The appId with the msgId uniquely identifies the Notification that should be dismissed, since the msgId alone identifies the Notification only in the scope of the Notification sender service
      void receive(Notification notification)
      Receive a Notification

    • Method Detail

      • receive

        void receive(Notification notification)
        Receive a Notification
        Parameters:
        notification -

      • dismiss

        void dismiss(int msgId,
           java.util.UUID appId)
        The appId with the msgId uniquely identifies the Notification that should be dismissed, since the msgId alone identifies the Notification only in the scope of the Notification sender service
        Parameters:
        msgId - The message id of the Notification that should be dismissed
        appId - The appId of the Notification sender service
